code: import React,{useRef}from'react';import{auth}from'../firebase';import'./../styles/SignUpScreen.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var SignInScreen=function SignInScreen(){var emailRef=useRef(null);var passwordRef=useRef(null);var register=function register(e){e.preventDefault();auth.createUserWithEmailAndPassword(emailRef.current.value,passwordRef.current.value).then(function(authUser){console.log(authUser);}).catch(function(error){alert(error.message);});};var signIn=function signIn(e){e.preventDefault();auth.signInWithEmailAndPassword(emailRef.current.value,passwordRef.current.value).then(function(authUser){console.log(authUser);}).catch(function(err){return alert(err.message);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"signUpScreen",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Sign In"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{ref:emailRef,placeholder:"Email",type:"email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{ref:passwordRef,placeholder:"Password",type:"password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",onClick:signIn,children:"Sign In"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"signUpScreen-gray",children:"New to Netflix?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"signUpScreen-link",onClick:register,children:"Sign Up now."})]})]})});};export default SignInScreen;
